title: Warwick needs a rework.
body: Warwick has a kit that a lot of people consider boring and predictable. His E in my opinion is next to useless to some extent, and Warwick overall doesn't really have any out play potential at all. Do you think Warwick needs a rework in the future??

replies.body: I'm pretty sure he's already on the schedule for a rework but I don't think he's as high a priority as a lot of the other ones.
Yeah, i totally agree with you. {{champion:19}}  does need a rework, but other champions like {{champion:83}}  needs a rework more than {{champion:19}} .
Warwick is either UP or OP, broken kit, can't be balanced.

He's my main since I've begun playing this game and I can't deny his problematic state :( 
Even though I've managed to climb elo ladders picking Warwick as much as I could , I wonder how many time I will be able to keep playing him effectively given the ascendent mobility meta
Obviusly he needs a rework, ZenonTheStoic made a scratch in the past of a Warwick rework, maybe the new champion update team can use it to start the Warwick rework!
